summary: There's nothing more beautiful and emotional than Anne seeing his baby boy singing. In particular when it comes to IICF or/& SC....
caption:
There’s nothing more beautiful and emotional than Anne seeing his baby boy singing. In particular when it comes to IICF or/& SC. She must be so proud of him. Obviously. A well known moment comes to my mind : no matter how famous you’ll become, you’ll always be my baby.

Well, I think I’m gonna bourst out crying. I love him so so much.

summary: i’m in love with the ceo!harry and rival ceo falling in love,,, please write more about them!!
question: i’m in love with the ceo!harry and rival ceo falling in love,,, please write more about them!!
answer:
at first harry would be so opposed to the idea and would even think that y/n chatted him up at that award party for the sake to be involved with him and just suddenly be the downfall of his company and it completely steers him away from his rival.

but he would be lying every time he says that he’s irritated when he sees you randomly in places he didn’t even expect you to be there at the same time as him.

in that low-key café who nails both their quinoa AND mac n’ cheese and it’s so underrated it’s not funny?

in that art gallery he’s sure only had a one day advertisement of it opening to filter the people who come?

in that store with great notebooks and have an average price and he sees you pushing a cart that’s full of record books and leather-bound personal planners and sticky notes from the sale section yourself with no security whatsoever wearing home clothes?

harry thinks it’s coincidence but you think not every time you see him in the corner of your eye just looking at you with an agape jaw and he rethinks of what he said that night of “stop bugging me! know you’re just trying to get what you don’t have” and he’s starting to regret it because he did makes some personal digs at you and your company at one point.

it’s fondness with him at first. and it builds up to the point he doesn’t even know what place makes him happy not unless he sees you atleast at his peripheral vision.

I saw Harry last night in Nashville. I’m still trying to process it. It was so good. I was dancing like a fool and loved it so much. Then I started waving my bi flag around and didn’t care what anyone thought.


I just love him so much.

summary: Husband!Harry dealing with his kids while they're on a sugar rush which he caused by letting them eat too much candy 🙉
question: Husband!Harry dealing with his kids while they're on a sugar rush which he caused by letting them eat too much candy 🙉
answer:
Harry groaned plopping down on the couch beside Noah and rose who were sitting there with a frown on their faces. All three of them were strictly told not to touch the cupcakes in the fridge due to excessive amount of sugar content they consume. Missus had given them firm instructions while she was out to get her nails done.

“But daddy they look delicious.” Rose whined looking at her dad who sighed defeated. He was told not to give them any sugary stuff as they were on sugar rush. It all happened when harry brought them chocolates from different countries after returning from tour. He was just excited and knew how much they loved chocolates but little babies, they ate all of them in a day.

Even refused to share it with Gemma’s daughter and that was enough to make missus go all mad.

“It’s okay sweetie. Um we can still drink milk.” He stuttered combing his fingers through her long brown hair.

“It’s not sweet daddy!!!” Noah protested sitting on his father’s lap and squishing Harry’s cheek. He squished and squished until Harry got up on his feet carrying him to the fridge followed by Rose.

“Don’t tell mommy unless you want daddy to die”

summary: Husband Harry helping the kids with homework ❤❤Omg
question: Husband Harry helping the kids with homework ❤❤Omg
answer:
“And the animals who live in forests are called wild animals. So what kind of animal lion is a wild animal or a domestic one?” Harry asked Rose who was sitting beside him with her science book on her lap. Harry has his reading glasses set on the bridge of his nose as he taught Rose about types of animals according to their habitat.

Missus smiled sitting opposite to them on the bed breastfeeding three months old Noah. He was a momma’s boy and never let missus away from him not even a second, so everyday after coming back from studio it was Harry’s duty to help Rose with her homework and studies.

“Um domestic daddy!!” She smiled raising her pencil up proudly thinking she got the right answer. Harry chuckled upon her reaction and shook his head. He reached down to brush hair off her forehead falling on her eyes and gave her soft pink cheeks a soft rub kissing them delicately.

“No bug. It’s a wild animal. You can’t keep lion inside your house “ he chuckled erasing the tick mark off her book that rose did on the wrong answer.

“But daddy yesterday I heard mommy saying that how you’re wild as a lion and I thought maybe lion can too live inside a house like you” she mumble keeping her gaze on her book and putting a tick mark on the box of right answer.
Harry’s cheek burned as the memory of last night replayed in his mind where he had missus pinned down on the bed beneath her.

“Um well that’s a different case baby. You apparently can not keep lion inside the house” he smirked pinching the bridge of his nose and set his glasses on it before sending a wink to his wife who had the same smirk as him.

title: Best friend’s brother part 5
body:
You had yet to tell him. Eddie was currently playing the guitar on the floor of his room at the beach house as you lied on his fluffy white comforter. Eddie’s mum had invited you over for the family holidays again but this time your family had decided to actually rent the cabin next door, so the four of you tagged along with The Styles for the holidays. 

You had thought this would be the perfect time to tell Eddie for he would be close to the sea and he always said how much he loved the sea, how good the waves could do to a man so you thought he wouldn’t be half as mad as he would had he been back home. He had decided he wanted to play the guitar just after seeing your brother playing on the porch late at night when your parents had already gone to their room. Their relationship was as messy as it could get, once they were apart and the next day they were back together but you had learnt to ignore that, to ignore them for the most part, and so in those summer nights you would stay with your brother on the porch reading a book as the ocean breeze hit the back of your neck and he played the guitar. And now Eddie wanted to learn, for some reason- maybe to enjoy more of your “hot brother’s” company or maybe because all of a sudden he was suddenly interested in music. Yeah, probably the first one. 

“That was almost good.” You told him as he smiled playfully at you. 

“If you keep that up I won’t take you to any awards show.” He shurgged and you laughed. 

“I better change then. Chances are high you make it.” You joked as he chuckled and rested his back on the wall, looking at you with the meaningul look only he could give you. 

“I’m so happy you’re here.” He smiled. 

“I’m happy to be here too.” 

He smiled before he resumed playing the guitar, thinking how happy he really was that you were there even though he had feared you coming on holidays with them. With each passing day, he was more and more certain of his brother’s feelings for you and it made him worried sick- to think that he could ever be anything but friendly with you. It wasn’t as if he was in love with you, not at all, that thought alone was almost repulsive- but you were the closest thing to a sister he had and only to think his brother could hurt you in any way? You flipped the page of your book and bumped with Harry’s eyes when you looked ahead through the window to the beach, he was coming up to the house from the seashore and his green eyes were set on you, a big happy grin on his face.

He glanced over at his brother and rolled his eyes, pointing at his wrist as if he had an invisible watch and frowning; it was his turn to have you, which made you roll your eyes and smile. But he was right, you hadn’t been alone with him all day and if you were being fair, you missed him as well so you showed him your tongue playfully and he brought his hand to his chest as if you had hit him, shaking his head with a smile before disappearing inside the house. All this time, Eddie had been frantically typing away on his phone so he stopped you right when you were going to bring it up. 

“Eddie, there’s something I need to-” 

“Jack just asked me out.” He raised his eyebrows. 

He had met Jack just the day before, down at the beach, and they had instantly hit it off so you smiled at his good news, not having the energy to being annoyed about him not listening. 

“That’s great, Ed.” You smiled. 

“What you have to tell me.” He stared at you. “Can it wait?” 

You nodded, standing from his bed and walking outside his room as he started getting ready for his date. You rested your head against his door as soon as you closed it and sighed. Did he already know? You hadn’t said you needed to tell him something, only that you needed to- 

Walking inside the kitchen, you smiled at the sight of your secret boyfriend cutting watermelon and putting the pieces on a bowl. He was shirtless, light blue swimming trunks on his hips. He had spent the morning on the beach with his mum. You smiled as you rested your hip on the counter next to his fruit bowl and took a piece of watermelon, bringing it to your mouth and smirking as he watched you. 

“Oh, hi stranger.” 

He smiled, looking around before pressing his hips against yours, trapping you against the counter with both hands on your sides as he leaned in to capture your lips with his. He hummed at the taste of cold watermelon water dripping from your lips and he pushed you once against the counter, thrusting his hips in a warning way when you teased him with your tongue. 

“Please tell me you don’t have plans tonight.” He whispered. 

You smiled, you had spent most of your time with Eddie or with your brother so it was true you had been depriving him of his precious time alone with you so you pecked his nose as you shook your head, making him grin as he squeezed your hip. 

“Good then now you do.” He smiled. “I want to spend some alone time with my girl.” 

“I want to spend some time alone with you too.” You whispered as he smiled and raised you up so you were sitting on the counter, his hands running up and down your naked thighs. 

“I haven’t stop thinking about last night all day.” He whispered,

for the night before you had stumbled over to his room, very late and kinda drunk, and you had asked him to shower with you, which had resulted in hot, hard thrusts on the shower that had left you walking funny for the whole morning after. 

“I could still feel you just hours ago.” You whispered, knowing the effect it would have on him and he groaned, thrusting his hips against yours again. 

“Not anymore?” 

You stared into his eyes, shooking your head slowly as you played with the hem of this trunks. Maybe it was the adrenaline rush at the fear of getting caught, or maybe it was the safety of hearing Eddie’s shower running as he sang but you were loving the way he was breathing, looking down at your small hands as your fingertips ran his skin under the hem. 

“Will you fix that, babe?” You asked him, getting your fingertips dangerously closed to his groin. “Will you make me feel you like that again?”

“Fuck, Y/N. You’re gonna drive me crazy.” He whispered. 

“You want me to stop?” You smirked, your nails caressing the skin around his lenght. 

“I want to fuck you against this counter.” He whispered, making your breath hitched on your throat as he regained control of the situation. “I want to push you against the tile and fuck you so hard you’ll feel me for a week. You would like that, wouldn’t you?” He smirked. “You’re such a tease, baby girl, but two can play this game.” 

He laughed at your flustered expression, lips parted, flushed cheeks and eyes wide, and he took your hand out of his trucks, pecking your lips sweetly a few times before he took the watermelon bowl and walked to the couch, putting on some TV right before his mum walked inside the house too, holding her white beach hat over her head.

“Hey, baby, he’s the one who didn’t want to talk to you, not me, don’t yell at me.”

“But you’re the reason he doesn’t want to talk to me! You had no right!”

You had yet to tell him. Eddie was currently playing the guitar on the floor of his room at the beach house as you lied on his fluffy white comforter. Eddie’s mum had invited you over for the family holidays again but this time your family had decided to actually rent the cabin next door, so the four of you tagged along with The Styles for the holidays. 

You had thought this would be the perfect time to tell Eddie for he would be close to the sea and he always said how much he loved the sea, how good the waves could do to a man so you thought he wouldn’t be half as mad as he would had he been back home. He had decided he wanted to play the guitar just after seeing your brother playing on the porch late at night when your parents had already gone to their room. Their relationship was as messy as it could get, once they were apart and the next day they were back together but you had learnt to ignore that, to ignore them for the most part, and so in those summer nights you would stay with your brother on the porch reading a book as the ocean breeze hit the back of your neck and he played the guitar. And now Eddie wanted to learn, for some reason- maybe to enjoy more of your “hot brother’s” company or maybe because all of a sudden he was suddenly interested in music. Yeah, probably the first one. 

“That was almost good.” You told him as he smiled playfully at you. 

“If you keep that up I won’t take you to any awards show.” He shurgged and you laughed.

“hi. want to drop a product of ours to make way for another one. can y’recommend something? need you in my office?”

harry tapped on your desk and it slightly startles you, but so is the entire floor as they’re looking at their boss at the floor he barely visits at these times but he pays them no mind, even throwing a little smile on your way.

“mr. styles! i’m not rejecting it but uhm well you see, i’m not the head of sales, it’s amy over there. i think she would be-…”

“you’re not?”

he’d tilt his head feigning confusion and he doesn’t have to turn his head to know that amy’s right there in her office and the fact that she is the head but if it meant to have you up at the office and use that as an excuse to come down here or call you up?

“then congrats. you’re the new sales manager.”

harry goes on about his days and he isn’t lying that he’s running out of excuses to see you, even coming to a desperate point in where he called you up to ask if they made a sale on their product that just launched at that ~exact~ day and of course it did but how can he find anything else to talk to you when he’s running out of material? he needs atleast two more days to ask you out for dinner so he gets to know more with personal questions he asks here and there.

he decided to screw it instead, running down to your own office he doesn’t knock on anymore as you instructed because of course it’s him, and he can’t help but to feel a little agitated when he realized he should’ve.

hasn’t been more than two seconds until he catches an employee making flirt with you and he knows it’s not business because he hears dinner and would at the same sentence and he just stares him down, arms across his chest and it makes him furious because he remembers that it’s the guy in PR who niall describes as a flirt, an asshole and golfs to show off.

harry furrows his eyebrows at him and god his stare is something that makes someone wanna burst into flames right then and there, his head tilting to your door.

“out.”

once that’s done, harry just shrugs his jealousy away as he comes face to face with someone he’s smitten with to the point of no return, amusement clearly evident in your face and he’s glad.

“lunch with me?”

trail.content:
okay damn it this is an attack

“hi. want to drop a product of ours to make way for another one. can y’recommend something? need you in my office?”

harry tapped on your desk and it slightly startles you, but so is the entire floor as they’re looking at their boss at the floor he barely visits at these times but he pays them no mind, even throwing a little smile on your way.

“mr. styles! i’m not rejecting it but uhm well you see, i’m not the head of sales, it’s amy over there. i think she would be-…”

“you’re not?”

he’d tilt his head feigning confusion and he doesn’t have to turn his head to know that amy’s right there in her office and the fact that she is the head but if it meant to have you up at the office and use that as an excuse to come down here or call you up?

“then congrats. you’re the new sales manager.”

harry goes on about his days and he isn’t lying that he’s running out of excuses to see you, even coming to a desperate point in where he called you up to ask if they made a sale on their product that just launched at that ~exact~ day and of course it did but how can he find anything else to talk to you when he’s running out of material? he needs atleast two more days to ask you out for dinner so he gets to know more with personal questions he asks here and there.

he decided to screw it instead, running down to your own office he doesn’t knock on anymore as you instructed because of course it’s him, and he can’t help but to feel a little agitated when he realized he should’ve.

hasn’t been more than two seconds until he catches an employee making flirt with you and he knows it’s not business because he hears dinner and would at the same sentence and he just stares him down, arms across his chest and it makes him furious because he remembers that it’s the guy in PR who niall describes as a flirt, an asshole and golfs to show off.

harry furrows his eyebrows at him and god his stare is something that makes someone wanna burst into flames right then and there, his head tilting to your door.

“out.”

once that’s done, harry just shrugs his jealousy away as he comes face to face with someone he’s smitten with to the point of no return, amusement clearly evident in your face and he’s glad.

“lunch with me?”

summary: For his show in Nashville, Harry wore a custom Gucci suit. The blue suit features a cropped jacket with dark blue contrast peak...
caption:
For his show in Nashville, Harry wore a custom Gucci suit. The blue suit features a cropped jacket with dark blue contrast peak lapels and buttons. The lapels and cuffs are adorned with crystals in intricate patterns while the line along the bottom of the jacket is embellished with a simpler crystal detail. The flared and high waisted trousers feature a matching crystal embroidery on the bottom of the legs. He completed the look with a black shirt and black leather boots. Photos by BrdgstoneArena.

Custom Gucci suit
worn with Gucci Spring 2018 boots

summary: Welp, officially seeing Harry Styles live
body:
Welp, officially seeing Harry Styles live

On Friday in Philly!


My cousin got me tickets and I finally listened to his album the day before yesterday and quite liked it!

It was weird for me at first just because of writing Freak with his face/aspects of his life in mind.

I already got a hate message basically saying I “don’t deserve to go” since I’m not “a true fan” but whatever 🖕🏻


Sorry I never got into One Direction and don’t want to constantly obsess about his music and pry into his personal life because I recognize that he’s not a “god” and see him as regular human being who happens to have great talent?

Either way I’m excited and it’s gonna be a new experience for me! Just need to work on memorizing his album more!

summary: Ceo!Harry when you're his major business rival but yall fall hard for each other
question: Ceo!Harry when you're his major business rival but yall fall hard for each other
answer:
“don’t think we have a way out of this.”

harry would sigh onto your shoulder from behind as you’re sat on his lap, literally physically and relationship-wise because both of you are too invested in this to the point nights weren’t just spent for sexual purposes anymore and the fact that both parties are business rivals.

he doesn’t care though, only looks at the skyline of his own office the both of you’ve been in even before the sun rised, his hand coming to intertwine with yours.

“we could always merge.”

his future missuc chuckles sleepily, looking back at harry with a dopey smile.

“business-wise as in Styles and my last name, or life-wise as in we’re both Styles?”
